name: Blade of the Warlord
flavorText: Awrak led the people of the Bear tribe to a great many victories in his all-too-short life. His name is still highly revered among his people.
flavorTextHtml: Awrak led the people of the Bear tribe to a great many victories in his all-too-short life. His name is still highly revered among his people.

secondary.textHtml: Bash consumes up to 40 Fury to deal up to 428% increased damage. (Barbarian Only) [400 - 500]%
